/* -.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.
Life is complex it has both real and imaginary part --newton.
_._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._.*/
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define ull unsigned long long int

int main()
{
	int n,q;
	cin >> n >> q;
	bool fl = true;
	ull mx,mn,x;
	for(int i = 0;i < n;i++){
		cin >> x;
		if(fl){
			fl = false;
			mx = mn = x;
		}
		if(x > mx){
			mx = x;
		}
		if(x < mn){
			mn = x;
		}
	}
	while(q--){
		cin >> x;
		if(x >= mn && x<= mx){
			cout<<"Yes\n";
		}else{
			cout<<"No\n";
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
